channel.title: Need help now!

item.title: Need help now!
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

PI FILES:
SRC > SERVER > CONFIG.java

EXAMPLE:

Those booleans would be describing the settings for their names.

public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = true; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true; // can admin drop items?

This is the command part:

public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

Just go to administrator commands and add:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); } } catch(Exception e) {

Right under the admin void.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help now!
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

For me it’s in my src folder in a SERVER file don’t know if it’s .cfg or .java
but in there there are strings the same as what you’re looking for.
If you can follow a string from there and all its methods displayed just copy them and config them to control that command.

item.title: Need help now!
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

What source is this?

If it’s PI just add that command out of the “Ownercommandstring” and place it under the “Administratorcommandstring”
Don’t need to change any of the text.
Or is there anything in your config in CAPITALS as a setting like “CAN_ADMINS_SPAWN”?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help now!
item.dc:creator: @zniitrous zniitrous
item.description:
@zniitrous wrote:

ok so i have a problem i have it so owners can spawn but admins cant how do i make it so i can have owners and admins spawn but admins dont have owner commands this is what im looking at right now

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
